name: EURGAVA™ - Fight for Haaria
description: EURGAVA™ - Fight for Haaria, a reaction-based combat rpg where you struggle to rebuild your broken village, learn the fate of your home country, and restore its order. Get ready!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.00 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: 16:9 resolution recommended
